The paragraph is not about diseases, but rather about two processed pseudogenes (UBE3AP1 and UBE3AP2) and their genomic organization. Processed pseudogenes are non-functional copies of genes that have lost their ability to produce a functional protein due to mutations. They are not diseases, but rather genetic features.
